DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and effectiveness of IDP-107 in treating patients with acne vulgaris.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of IDP-107 in Patients With Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Presence of inflammatory and noninflammatory lesions Dermatological conditions of the face that could interfere with clinical evaluations Female subjects who are pregnant, nursing, planning a pregnancy, or become pregnant during the study
